records.location_details: Incident occurred on a highway in North Macedonia, involving a vehicle parked on a stop lane and passing a tunnel.
records.where_clear: Highway in North Macedonia, near a tunnel.
records.location_text_raw: North Macedonia, on the highway, parked on a stop lane on the highway, passing the tunnel
records.uncertainty_note: Specific highway and tunnel name are not provided, only the country and general type of location.

possible_violations.violation_name: Misconduct by SC Officer and MKD Officer
possible_violations.legal_basis: Articles 3, 10 and 17 of Code of Conduct

records.context_note: A complaint was filed regarding alleged misconduct by a Frontex SC Officer and an MKD Officer. The officers reportedly accepted 40 euros as a fine without providing a receipt from a citizen who was stopped on a highway. The SC Officer admitted the incident took place but stated the check was conducted by the MKD Officer while he remained in the patrol car.
records.evidence_quote: According to the complaint, the citizen was brought under control by the officers, and during the course of checks, the officers reportedly accepted 40 euros from the individual as a fine without providing a receipt for the transaction.
